Author: CrossHedge
Title: [ANN] CROSS HEDGE - Join the Next Generation of Management
Body: Cross Hedge is proud to announce its ICO will be launching on May 22nd 2018 !  From our Parisian HQ we focus on building a better financial future for all by democratizing the access to fund and asset management through Artificial Intelligence & Technology.  We, at CrossHedge have developed an AI powered investment system that gives you the stability you are after. We distribute different investment solutions directly to you, eliminating financial intermediation. Our system works with Smart contracts, called Smartpieces™, and is rooted in Stellar blockchain technology for faster, cheaper and more reliable transactions, revolutionizing today’s models. It is fully automated, using the most innovative statistical modeling, machine learning and pattern recognition techniques enabling us to bring transparency and barrier-free equity into the world of investment.  Every person wishing to invest could freely and with no capital floor, access a diversified portfolio respecting full transparency through Stellar blockchain for both valuation and distribution, allowing for higher security. Our community will be able to oversee the ins and outs of their investments at all times without any restrictions. Feel free to contact us at contact@cross-hedge.com  Check out our video presentation on https://youtu.be/13OY3drd-2w  And stay tuned for updates and infos about XH !

Author: lalaland97cute
Title: [ANN] CROSS HEDGE - Join the Next Generation of Management
Body: I see your project is still quite new and hope it will develope strongly in the future. If I have a chance, I will be a part of your community.

Author: dzkrb
Title: [ANN] CROSS HEDGE - Join the Next Generation of Management
Body: It is very good that to develop your platform, you have taken one of the best platforms - Stellar, which really has very fast transactions. But, according to my information, Stellar is not decentralized.
